data.name: Page_HoverHelp_Campaign.aspx_SetManageCmpMoBudget
data.value:
Set your budget, and then decide how to spend it. Divide budget across the month if you have a fixed budget or don't want to regularly monitor your campaign. Spend budget until depleted if your budget is flexible, your goal is to maximize impressions, and you can monitor your campaign.
${124yek|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPCampaignOrder.apsx_Targeting
data.value:
When you set up an ad group, you must specify the language and market. Then you can target customers by location and time. To make your targeted ads more competitive, you can set incremental bids for specific hours of the day, days of the week, gender, or age on the Targeting settings page.
${109pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPCampaignOrder.apsx_CampaignTargeting
data.value:
When you set up a campaign, you must specify the language and market. Then you can target customers by location and time. To make your targeted ads more competitive, you can set incremental bids for hours of the day, days of the week, gender, or age on the Targeting settings page.
${247pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPCampaignOrder.aspx_Language_region
data.value:
When you create a campaign or an ad group, you select the language that you will write your ads in. You also select the market (websites that your ads can appear on). For example, English UK ads appear when people search on msn.co.uk; French France ads appear when people search on fr.msn.com.
${110pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPCampaignOrder.aspx_Distribution1
data.value:
Bing Ads offers two ways to distribute your ads: through the search network (ads are displayed on {SEARCHBRAND} results pages) and through the content network (ads are displayed on select webpages with relevant content). By default, new ad groups are distributed through both the search and content networks.
${112pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPCampaignOrder.aspx_Distribution2
data.value:
Bing Ads offers two ways to distribute your ads: through the search network (ads are displayed on {SEARCHBRAND} results pages) and through the content network (ads are displayed on select webpages with relevant content). By default, new ad groups are distributed through both the search and content networks.
${121pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing.aspx_Incremental_bids
data.value:
Select incremental bids to add to your ad group bid when people who match your targeting criteria for location or time click your ad.
${104pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing.aspx_Targeting
data.value:
When you place an incremental bid, you increase the likelihood that:
1. Your ad will be displayed in a better position, because your overall bid is higher.
2. Customers who see your ad will click it, which can help boost your conversion rates and return on investment.
${103pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing.aspxKeywPerf_SetManageCmpMoSpend
data.value:
When you set your campaign budget, select per month if you don't anticipate changing your budget on a regular basis. Select per day if you want to make frequent budget changes based on campaign strategy, for example, to adjust for heavier traffic during a sale or promotion.
${129pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing.aspxPricing_SetManageCmpMoSpend
data.value:
When you set your campaign budget, select per month if you don't anticipate changing your budget on a regular basis. Select per day if you want to make frequent budget changes based on campaign strategy, for example, to adjust for heavier traffic during a sale or promotion.
${129pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing_Base_bid_0
data.value:
You can set a single bid (your ad group bid) for all keywords in your ad group, or, you can set individual bids for all or specific keywords. To set individual bids, click Advanced bidding, and then type bids in the keywords table.
${130pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing_Base_bid_11
data.value:
You can set a single bid (your ad group bid) for all behavioral segments in your ad group, or, you can set individual bids for all or selected segments. To set individual bids, click Advanced bidding, and then type bids in the behavioral segments table.
${264pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing_Base_bid_12
data.value:
You can set a single bid (your ad group bid) for all networks or websites in your ad group, or, you can set individual bids for all or selected placements. To set individual bids, click Advanced bidding, and then type bids in the website placements table.
${263pop|More...}

data.name: ConversionTrackingHelpText
data.value: Conversion tracking helps you find out how many people that click on your ads actually buy your product. To track conversions, you must place a small snippet of javascript on your site. etc. etc.

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPOrderKeywords_Match_types
data.value:
Using search match types, you specify how closely a search query matches your keyword before your ad is displayed on {SEARCHBRAND} results pages. There are three match types for search ads: broad (the default), phrase, and exact. In general, you choose match types depending on whether you want your ad displayed to the most people possible (broad match) or people who may be more likely to click your ad (exact match).
${147yek|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_P4PAdLibrary.aspx_Dynamic_text
data.value:
Dynamic text refers to text variables that you can include in your ad. By using dynamic text, you may increase the chance that potential customers respond to your ad because your ad changes based on search queries.You can also use dynamic text to update a large number of ads simultaneously with custom data you enter.
${142yek|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_P4PAdLibrary.aspx_Create_ad
data.value:
For your ads to run without delay, they must meet Bing Ads Editorial Guidelines. Ads you create or edit have a status that keeps you informed about where the ad is in the review process. An Active ad runs shortly after meeting the guidelines. A Disapproved ad will not run. An Inactive ad is undergoing review, but will run unless it contains adult, pharmaceutical, or gambling terms, or exclusive keywords (keywords that require special permission).
${108pop|More...}

data.name: Page_PFPOrderKeywords_DeleteKeywordsText

data.name: Page_PFPOrderKeywords_DeleteMessageConfirmation

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPOrderKeywords.aspx_quick_keywords
data.value: Keywords are the words that people use to search online for your product or service. You enter keywords and then bid on them so that your ad may be displayed to potential customers. ${107pop|More...}

data.name: Page_CampSummary_BulkToolNegKeywordsHelpText
data.value:
Negative keywords
To replace all of your negative keywords, enter new negative keywords (separated by commas) in the New value box, and then click Apply.

data.name: Page_CampSummary_BulkToolConvHelpText
data.value:
Conversion tracking
To turn on conversion tracking, select New value and click Apply. To turn it off, make sure the check box is cleared and click Apply.

data.name: Page_CampSummary_BulkToolContentHelpText
data.value:
Turning off ad distribution to the content network
When you click Apply, Content Ads in the selected campaigns will be redistributed as follows:
- Ad groups with CPC pricing will be converted to Search Ads and distributed on the search network.
- Ad groups with CPM pricing will continue to be distributed on the content network.
If you want to change these distribution settings, edit each ad group individually on the Change ad group settings page.

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_KeywordReearcher.aspx_Lifestyle
data.value:
Lifestyle
The Lifestyle chart can help you evaluate search traffic for the keywords you have selected. The categories are created from demographics collected from specific cities relevant to Bing Ads markets and are based on the premise that neighborhoods in these cities share common lifestyle and income patterns.

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_KeywordResearcher.aspx_Wealth
data.value:
Wealth
The Wealth Index chart can help you evaluate search traffic for the keywords or websites you select. This data is available only for the U.S. market at this time, and it does not reflect the wealth index data of other regions of the world.

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_KeywordResearcher.aspx_Geographical_Location
data.value:
Geographical Location
The Geographical Location chart displays only the top most-searched-from locations for the keywords or websites you select.

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_KeywordResearcher.aspx_Age_and_Gender
data.value:
Age and Gender
The Age and Gender chart does not include figures for computer users under the age of 18, even if the keywords or websites you select are relevant to that audience.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_3
data.value: It looks like your ad, keyword, or website might contain adult content, which we do not allow in the general marketplace. If you feel your content is not adult, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. If you are an adult-enabled advertiser, you are restricted to terms on the approved Adult Keyword List. Please refer to our Adult Content Guidelines to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_4
data.value: It looks like your website might currently be inaccessible. Our Ad Content and Style Guidelines require that your website must be accessible at all times. data.name: HoverHelp_QualityScore
data.value:
The quality score is an indicator of overall ad quality, weighing factors such as keyword and ad relevance, click-through rate, and user engagement. Combined with your bid, the quality score determines your ad's position in {SEARCHBRAND} results.

Higher quality keywords get better ad positions and have lower bid requirements. If keywords do not meet the minimum bid requirements, ads will not be eligible for placement in {SEARCHBRAND}. As keyword performance improves, you may be eligible for decreased minimum bid requirements.
${1005yek|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing_PricingCPC_0
data.value:
Ad group bid (max. CPC) is the maximum bid you are willing to pay for each click that your ad receives. The actual cost per click (CPC) might be higher, however, if you add incremental bids to pay for targeting.
${131pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing_PricingCPC_11
data.value:
Ad group bid (max. CPC) is the maximum bid you are willing to pay for each segment. The actual cost per click (CPC) for each keyword varies based on any incremental bids, other advertisers' bids, and your ad's performance.
${131pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing_PricingCPC_12
data.value:
Ad group bid (max. CPC) is the maximum bid you are willing to pay for each placement. The actual cost per click (CPC) for each keyword varies based on any incremental bids, other advertisers' bids, and your ad's performance.
${131pop|More...}

data.name: Page_HoverHelp_PFPPricing_PricingCPM
data.value:
The ad group bid (max. CPM) is the most you are willing to pay for every 1,000 ad impressions. (An impression occurs each time your ad is displayed.) The actual CPM might be higher, however, if you add incremental bids to pay for targeting.
${146yek|More...}

data.name: DesktopDownload_Heading
data.value: Import your Yahoo! account and campaign data

data.name: DesktopDownload_InstructionSummary
data.value:
One or more of your accounts has over 100,000 keywords, which exceeds the limit for importing directly into Bing Ads. You can use the Bing Ads Editor to quickly import your campaigns and upload them to Bing Ads.
To import your Yahoo! campaigns into Bing Ads, follow these steps:

data.name: DesktopDownload_StepOne
data.value: 1. Download and install the Bing Ads Editor.

data.name: DesktopDownload_StepTwo
data.value: 2. Use your Bing Ads user name and password to sign in to Bing Ads Editor.

data.name: DesktopDownload_StepThree
data.value: 3. On the Home tab, click Import, and then click Import from Yahoo!.

data.name: DesktopDownload_StepFour
data.value: 4. Follow the onscreen instructions to import your campaigns into Desktop.

data.name: DesktopDownload_StepFive
data.value: 5. In the Manager pane, fix any errors.

data.name: DesktopDownload_StepSix
data.value: 6. Click Sync Changes to upload your campaigns to Bing Ads.

data.name: DesktopDownload_StepSeven
data.value: 7. Repeat steps 3 to 6 for each account you want to import.

data.name: DesktopDownload_StepEight
data.comment: Removed text. Step no longer needed.

If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to our Disallowed Content Guidelines to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_270
data.value: Sites that offer or promote bulk-marketing products or services are not allowed if the stated or implied use of the product is unsolicited spam.

data.name: EditorialReasons_271
data.value: Pharmacy or health care products or services

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_271
data.value: It looks like your content might promote a supplement or ingredient that we do not allow. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to our Pharmacy and Health Care Products and Services Guidelines - Non-prescription medications and health supplements to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_272
data.value: It looks like your ad or website might feature financial products or services that do not comply with our editorial guidelines. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to our Disallowed Content Guidelines to make updates.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_273
data.value: It looks like your website might be missing the requirement for age verification of models. Websites that feature adult images must include an age disclaimer on their site and all models must have the appearance of being 18 years or older. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to the Adult Content Guidelines to make updates.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_274
data.value: It looks like your content might promote or facilitate the online sale of fireworks, which we do not allow. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to our Disallowed Content Guidelines to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_275
data.value: It looks like your content might contain references to counterfeit goods, which we do not allow. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to our Intellectual Property Guidelines to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_276
data.value: Advertising for the sale or use of web cams or surveillance equipment for non-legitimate use is not allowed.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_277
data.value: It looks like your content might promote knives as weapons, which we do not allow. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to the Disallowed Content Guidelines to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_278
data.value: It looks like your content might promote ammunition, which we do not allow. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to our Disallowed Content Guidelines to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_279
data.value: It looks like your content might promote gun parts and hardware, which we do not allow. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to the Disallowed Content Guidelines to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_280
data.value: It looks like your content might promote firearms or other weapons, which we do not allow. If you feel your content falls within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review the content again. Please refer to the Disallowed Content Guidelines to learn more.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_281
data.value: It looks like your website links to adult content but is missing a bridge page. If you feel your website is within guidelines, please submit an appeal and we will happily review it again. Please refer to our Adult Content Guidelines to make updates.

data.name: Editorial_RejectionReason_282
data.value: It looks like your ad or website might contain adult content that features animals, which we do not allow. data.value: Before you create a conversion goal to track conversions on your website, you need to create a UET tag.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_NoRecordsMsg_Line2
data.comment: {Placeholder={{createUetTag}}, {{createUetTag}} is a placeholder for a string, which is localized separately}

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tags_TrackingStatus_Enum_Unverified_Msg
data.value: We haven't verified that your UET tag tracking code has been added to your website. It can take up to 24 hours to receive the information for the first time. After that, you either have not added the UET tag tracking information to your website or there is an issue with the setup that you need to fix.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tags_TrackingStatus_Enum_Active_Msg
data.value: Your tag is working and sending customer activity to Bing Ads. You can now create conversion goals and target audiences with remarketing lists.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tags_TrackingStatus_Enum_Inactive_Msg
data.value: We haven't received any customer activity from the UET tag in the last 24 hours. Make sure that the UET tag tracking code is still on your website.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_TrackingStatus_Enum_Unverified_Msg
data.value: Bing Ads hasnt received any user activity data from the UET tag on your website. It can take up to 24 hours for Bing Ads to verify. If you still see this status, you either have not added the UET tag tracking code to your website or there is an issue with the setup that you need to fix.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_TrackingStatus_Enum_RecordingConversions_Msg
data.value: We've seen your UET tag and have recorded conversions within the last 7 days.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_TrackingStatus_Enum_NoRecentConversion_Msg
data.value: We've seen your UET tag, but haven't recorded any conversions in the last 7 days. This is most likely because you either have created the goal incorrectly, have not tagged your entire website, especially the pages that have the conversion action or you don't have any users converting on your site.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_TrackingStatus_Enum_TagInactive_Msg
data.value: Bing Ads has not received any user activity data from the UET tag in the last 24 hours. Make sure that the UET tag tracking code is still on your website.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_ContentCreated

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_HowItWorks_Desc
data.value: First, you need to add the UET tag tracking code throughout your website and then create conversion goals for the activities you want to track.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_DontHaveUetTag_Desc
data.value: To get started, go to the {{uetTagLink}} and click {{createUetTag}}. After you add the UET tag tracking code throughout your website, click {{createConversionGoal}} on this page.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_ConversionWindowTemplate
UnifiedEventTracking_Tags_ErrorMessageForTagName
data.value: Enter a tag name between 1 and 100 characters.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tags_ErrorMessageForTagDescription
data.value: Enter a tag description between 0 and 100 characters.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tags_DuplicateTagNameError
data.value: A tag with this name already exists. Enter a different name.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Conversions_Intro
data.value: Conversion tracking measures the return on investment of your campaign by tracking actions people take on your website after they click on your ad. When the action matches your conversion goal, it is counted as a conversion.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tags_Intro
data.value: Once you add the UET tag tracking code to your website, it allows Bing Ads to collect actions people take so you can track conversion goals or target audiences with remarketing lists.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_TagsPage_Intro
data.value: The UET tag tracking code, once added to your website, allows Bing Ads to collect actions people take so you can track conversions or target audiences with remarketing lists.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goals_Intro
data.value: Conversion goals allow you to define the user activity that you want to count as a conversion so you can track the activities that are important to you.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_UploadConversions_Intro
data.value: Offline conversions are transactions that originated from your ad but happened offline (for example, a sale over the phone). You can upload these offline transcations to Bing Ads.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_GoalsPage_Intro
data.value: Conversion goals allow you to define the user activity that you want to count as a conversion so you can track the ads, keywords, and campaigns that generate business for you.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tutorial_Tag_Desc
data.value: On the {{uetTagLink}}, click Create UET tag to get the tracking code that you can use with both conversion goals and remarketing lists.
data.comment: {Placeholder={{uetTagLink}}, {{uetTagLink}} is a placeholder for a string, which is localized separately}

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tutorial_Tracking_Desc

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tutorial_Create_Title

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tutorial_Create_Desc
data.value: On the {{goalLink}}, click {{createConversionGoal}} and then define what action you want to track as a conversion. {{goalHelp}}You can also click {{createRemarketingList}} from the {{audienceLink}} page to define audiences based on actions people take on your website.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Tutorial_Validation_Desc

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_TagViewer_EmailHeader

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_Intro
data.value: Enter a name for the conversion goal and select the type of action that you want to track as a conversion.

data.value: You dont have a UET tag yet and you need one before you create a UET conversion goal.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_DescriptionContent
data.comment: {placeholder={{goalname}},{{goaltype}}} {{goalname}} will be goal's name, {{goaltype}} will be goal's type

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_Type_Destination_EqualsTo
data.value: Only visits to this exact URL would be considered conversions. For example: If the web page URL you choose is www.contoso.com, a visit to www.contoso.com will count as a conversion.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_Type_Destination_BeginsWith
data.value: Visits to any web pages that contains the beginning of the URL you select would be considered a conversion. For example: If the web page URL you choose is www.contoso.com, www.contoso.com/home will count as a conversion.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_Type_Destination_Contains
data.value: Visits to any web pages that contain part of the text you input would be considered a conversion. For example: If the text you input is confirmation, visits to www.contoso.com/confirmation or www.adatum.com/confirmation will count as a conversion.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_Type_Destination_RegularExpression
data.value: Customize your own rules using regular expressions.

data.value: Add offline conversions to Bing Ads.

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_Type_HotelBookingInfo

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_Type_OnlineConversion_AutoTagDescription

data.name: UnifiedEventTracking_Goal_Creation_Type_MultiStage_Intro

data.name: InlineKeywordDiagnosis_Title
data.comment: {{keywordName}} is placeholder for the keyword in question.

data.name: InlineKeywordDiagnosis_GenericFailure_Text
data.value: Your ad isn't showing for this keyword right now. Try again in a few minutes.

data.name: InlineKeywordDiagnosis_LowSearchVolume_Text
data.value: Users don't search for this term very often on Bing Ads properties, so it's not eligible to trigger your ads. If this is a term that you expect to increase in popularity soon (like a new brand name), then you don't need to do anything; the keyword will start triggering ads automatically. Otherwise, we recommend trying {{toolName}} to find different keyword ideas to increase the traffic to your campaign.

data.name: InlineKeywordDiagnosis_NoQualityScore_Text
data.value: The quality score for this keyword is not available. If you have just added this keyword, its quality score will be available tomorrow.

data.name: InlineKeywordDiagnosis_ApprovedLimited_Text
data.value: This keyword has been approved to serve in at least one of its targeted locations, but is either pending or disapproved in at least one other targeted location. If the keyword is eligible, you can {{action}}, and the keyword will be reviewed by Bing Ads staff. Most reviews are completed within one business day.
data.comment: {{action}} is EditorialAppeal_RequestAnException wrapped by HTML tag

data.name: InlineKeywordDiagnosis_ApprovedLimited_Text_AdGroupLevel
data.value: This keyword has been approved to serve in at least one of its targeted locations, but is either pending or disapproved in at least one other targeted location. If the keyword is eligible, please {{action}}, and the keyword will be reviewed by Bing Ads staff. Most reviews are completed within one business day.
data.comment: {{action}} is EditorialAppeal_RequestAnExceptionForEntityOrAllEntityInAdGroup with entity equals Keyword wrapped by HTML tag

data.name: InlineKeywordDiagnosis_Remarketing_Not_Available
data.value: The ad status is not available because its remarketing list's targeting setting is Target and bid. To see how the remarketing list is performing, check impressions and clicks on the Audience tab.
data.comment: Audience tab doesn't need translation.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Intro
data.value: Remarketing in Paid Search lets you improve your return on investment by optimizing your campaigns for specific audiences, which are the people who have visited your website before.
data.comment: Do not remove the extra space at the end.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Intro_On_Audience_With_DMP
data.value: Improve your return on investment by optimizing your campaigns for different audiences.
data.comment: Do not remove the extra space at the end.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Intro_With_Custom_Audiences
data.value: A remarketing list lets you improve your return on investment by optimizing your campaigns for a specific audience, which are the people who have visited your website before. A remarketing list is one of several types of audiences.
data.comment: Do not remove the extra space at the end.

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step1_Title
data.value: 1. Create an association between an ad group and audiences

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step1_Desc
data.value: You can select multiple audiences from any of these categories:

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step1_Desc_List1
data.value: {{category}}: Lists you define of people who have visited or interacted with your website before.
data.comment: {{category}} is placeholder for Remarketing lists. Do not remove the extra space at the end.

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step1_Desc_List2
data.value: {{category}}: Categories of people created based on their actions on Bing or MSN. For example, Autos and Vehicles.
data.comment: {{category}} is placeholder for In-market audiences. Do not remove the extra space at the end.

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step1_Desc_List3
data.value: {{category}}: A type of remarketing list generated by using your own customer data, usually managed through a data provider.
data.comment: {{category}} is placeholder for Custom audiences. Do not remove the extra space at the end.

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step1_Desc_List4
data.value: {{category}}: Lists of people who are similar to those in your remarketing lists.
data.comment: {{category}} is placeholder for Similar audiences. Do not remove the extra space at the end.

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step1_List_Product
data.value: {{category}}: Cultivated lists of people who have recently visited your website based on their interactions with your products or services.
data.comment: {{category}} is placeholder for Product audiences. Do not remove the extra space at the end.

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step2_Desc
data.value: Optimize ad groups for remarketing by adjusting bids, tailoring ads, or broadening keywords. To adjust bids, select an association in the table below, and then click {{changebid}}.
data.comment: {{changebid}} is placeholder for Edit > Change bid adjustment

data.name: Remarketing_DMP_Tutorial_Step2_Segmentation_Desc
data.value: Optimize ad groups for remarketing by adjusting bids, tailoring ads, or broadening keywords. To adjust bids, select an association in the table below, and then click {{changebid}}. To view and compare different audience category performances, go to {{audiencesegment}} from the Campaign page.
data.comment: {{changebid}} is placeholder for Edit > Change bid adjustment, {{audiencesegment}} is placeholder for Segment > Audience

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step1_Title
data.value: Add the UET tag to your website once

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step1_Desc
data.value: The same UET tag is used with both conversion tracking and remarketing. If you already added a UET tag to your website, you can skip this step. If you need a UET tag, {{uetpage}} and click {{createtag}}.
data.comment: {{uetpage}} is a place holder for go to the UET tag page and {{createtag}} is a place holder for Create UET tag.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step1_Desc_UetLink
data.value: go to the UET tag page
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{uetpage}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step1_Desc.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step1_Desc_CreateUetLink
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{createtag}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step1_Desc.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step2_Desc
data.value: To define an audience based on actions people take on your website, on this page, click {{createremarket}}.
data.comment: {{createremarket}} is a place holder for Create remarketing list.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step2_Desc_Link
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{createremarket}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step2_Desc and Remarketing_Tutorial_Step2_Desc_Alt.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step2_Desc_Alt
data.value: To define an audience based on actions people take on your website, go to {{audiencelibrary}} and then click {{createremarket}}.
data.comment: {{audiencelibrary}} is a place holder for Shared Library - Audience page and {{createremarket}} is a place holder for Create remarketing list.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step2_Desc_Link_Alt
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{audiencelibrary}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step2_Desc_Alt.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Title
data.value: Associate remarketing list with ad groups

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc
data.value: To associate a remarketing list with an ad group, go to the {{audiencetab}}, and then click {{createassociation}}. If you want to create associations in bulk, on this page, click {{bulkadd}}.
data.comment: {{audiencetab}} is a place holder for Campaigns page Audiences tab, {{createassociation}} is placeholder for Create association, {{bulkadd}} is placeholder for Add to ad groups

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_AudienceTabLink
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{audiencetab}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc and Audiences_AssociationSuccess_Message.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_AssociateLink
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{createassociation}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc and Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_Alt.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_BulkAssociateLink
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{bulkadd}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_Alt
data.value: To associate a remarketing list with an ad group, on this page, click {{createassociation}}. If you want to create associations in bulk, go to {{adgroup}} and then click {{bulkadd}}.
data.comment: {{createassociation}} is placeholder for Create association, {{bulkadd}} is placeholder for Edit > Associate with remarketing lists.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_AdgroupTabLink
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{adgroup}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_Alt.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_BulkAssociateLink_Alt
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{bulkadd}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step3_Desc_Alt.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Desc
data.value: Optimize ad groups for remarketing by adjusting bids, tailoring ads, or broadening keywords. To adjust bids, go to the {{audiencetab}} and then click {{changebid}}.
data.comment: {{audiencetab}} is a place holder for Campaigns page Audiences tab, {{changebid}} is placeholder for Edit > Change bid adjustment

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Segmentation_Desc
data.value: Optimize ad groups for remarketing by adjusting bids, tailoring ads, or broadening keywords. To adjust bids, go to the {{audiencetab}} and then click {{changebid}}. To view and compare different audience category performances, go to {{audiencesegment}} from the Campaign page.
data.comment: {{audiencetab}} is a place holder for Campaigns page Audiences tab, {{changebid}} is placeholder for Edit > Change bid adjustment, {{audiencesegment}} is placeholder for Segment > Audience

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Desc_AudienceTabLink
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{audiencetab}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Desc.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Desc_ChangeBidLink
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{changebid}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Desc.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Desc_AudienceSegmentLink
data.comment: This is used for placeholder {{audience}} in Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Segmentation_Desc.

data.name: Remarketing_Tutorial_Step4_Desc_Alt
data.value: Optimize ad groups for remarketing by adjusting bids, tailoring ads, or broadening keywords. To adjust bids, on this page click {{changebid}}.
data.comment: {{changebid}} is placeholder for Edit > Change bid adjustment

data.name: CampaignSettingsStepDescription
data.value: Tell us about your campaign and where you want your ads to appear.

data.name: AdGroupsKeywordsStepDescription
data.value: Campaigns are made up of ad groups, and ad groups are made up of sets of keywords. Keywords are the words or phrases people search on when looking for a product or service. For example, if you sell men's clothes, you might have separate ad groups, with separate keyword lists, for dress shirts and casual shirts. Learn more about keywords

data.name: AdGroupsAutoTargetsStepDescription
data.value: The next step is to create at least one ad group.

data.name: AdsAdExtensionStepDescription
data.value: Now that youve created your ad groups, you need to create your ads. You can also include extra features with your ads, called ad extensions.

data.name: BudgetBidsStepDescription
data.value: In this final step, you decide how much you want to bid for your keywords. You can also make any other adjustments to your settings.

data.name: Button_SaveAndGo
data.value: Save & go to the next step

data.name: AuctionInsights_Instructions_AOL
data.value: The auction insights report shows you how your ads compete with other advertisers' ads. Every time someone performs a search on the Bing Network, Bing Ads runs an ad auction to determine which ads are shown and where they are placed on the search results page. This report provides performance data per URL on five key statistics for the selected date range.

data.name: BingAdsScript_Frequency_MonthlyTemplate
data.comment: {Locked,placeholder={{frequency}},{{dayOfMonth}},{{hour}}} {{frequency}} will be the monthly date range under this key AutomatedRules_FrequencyGrain_Monthly. {{dayOfMonth}} day of a month. {{hour}} will be one of the hours starting with key AutomatedRules_DailyOptions_

data.name: BingAdsScript_Frequency_WeeklyTemplate
data.comment: {Locked,placeholder={0},{1},{2}} {0} will be the weekly date range under this key AutomatedRules_FrequencyGrain_Weekly. {1} day of a week string, one of the keys starting with AutomatedRules_WeeklyOptions_. {2} will be one of the hours starting with key AutomatedRules_DailyOptions_

data.name: BingAdsScript_Frequency_DailyTemplate
data.comment: {Locked,placeholder={0},{1}} {0} will be the daily date range under this key AutomatedRules_FrequencyGrain_Daily. {1} will be one of the hours starting with key AutomatedRules_DailyOptions_

data.name: BusinessData_GMBImport_Desc
data.value: Set up an automated feed from your Google My Business for your location data.

data.name: BusinessData_ProductFeed_Desc
data.value: Product feeds are a key component to cooperative bidding, where retailers work hand-in-hand with manufacturers to drive product sales in specific channels. Setup is just two steps.

data.name: CPG_ProductFeed_NoResult
data.value: There are no uploaded feeds. To get started, click Upload feed.

data.name: CPG_LinkStoreGrid_NoResult
data.value: There are no linked stores. To get started, click Link to store.

data.name: CPG_LastUploadedStatus_Failed
data.value: State of last uploaded file on {{timeStamp}}: Failed

data.name: CPG_LastUploadedStatus_Succeed
data.value: State of last uploaded file on {{timeStamp}}: Successful

data.name: ProductGroupsGrid_BulkEdit_BidBoost_HeaderText
data.value: Edit bid boosts for multiple product groups

data.name: ProductGroupsGrid_BulkEdit_BidBoost_DescriptionText
data.value: Set all selected rows' bid boosts to:

data.name: CPG_Tutorial_CreateProductFeed_Content
data.value: The product feed is simply a list of items you're promoting with a manufacturer, a retailer, or another third party. You'll need to list the items in a file and add them to Bing Ads. In the Product feeds tab, click Upload feed to get started.

data.name: CPG_Tutorial_LinkStore_Content
data.value: Once you build your product feed, you need to gain access to your partner's Bing Merchant Center store to target sales on that channel. In the Linked stores tab, click Link to store to send a request for access.

data.name: CPG_Tutorial_CreateCampaign_Content
data.value: Once you've linked to your partner's store, build campaigns to highlight your product feed. Get those products in front of the right audience at the right time through bid boost, which is an expense that can be shared with your partner. In the {{link}}, click {{create}} to get started.
data.comment: {{{link}} is the link to campaign page, {{create}} is creating tag}

data.name: CPG_UploadToolbar_Desc
data.value: Provide a list of products you want to highlight in your partner's store. The product feed needs to contain the attributes that describe the product.

data.name: CPG_UploadProgress_Desc
data.value: Your file is being uploaded. Feel free to work in other parts of Bing Ads while we process this task. Once it's complete, you'll see the product feed in the grid.

data.name: CPG_LinkToolbar_Desc
data.value: To highlight products in a partner's store, you'll first need to gain access. Send a request to the store owner, who must approve or decline the request within 30 days. If approved, you'll see the store as a linked store in the grid.

data.name: LocationData_Desc
data.value: Set up an automated feed from your Google My Business for your location data.

data.name: LocationData_LogoutAlert_Msg
data.value: By deleting the link to your Google My Business account, you'll be deleting your automated feed set-up. Until you link to another Google My Business account, you'll continue to see the previous data, which will continue to be active. If you unlink your account and link to a new one, the previous location data will continue to appear, with a "Deleted" status, along with the new feed data.

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_Callout_Desc
data.value: Use Callout Extensions to promote popular or unique aspects of your business while highlighting your products or offers.

data.value: Promote popular or unique aspects of your business

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_CampaignContextKeyword_Desc
data.value: Building a large, robust, and relevant keyword list is a great way to open the door to customers who are interested in your business but aren't seeing your ads.

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_CompetitiveBid_Content
data.value: Setting competitive bids can help you get the edge on your competitors, all while growing your impression share. You can also gain unique and valuable insights into the auctions that youre competing in.

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_CompetitiveBid_Desc
data.value: Show your ads more often than advertisers like you, including {{competitors}}.
data.comment: {{competitors}} is place holder for one or two competitors

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_FirstPageBid_Desc

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_FirstPageBid_Title
data.value: Get your ads on the first page of search results

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_GoogleImport_Desc
data.value: Importing your campaigns from AdWords to Bing Ads can help you efficiently manage your accounts while also expanding your online advertising reach and impression share.

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_GoogleImportScheduled_Desc
data.value: Save time and effort by regularly re-importing your campaigns, all while efficiently expanding your online advertising reach.

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_GoogleImportScheduled_Title
data.value: Schedule automatic syncs with Google AdWords

data.name: Dashboard_OpptCard_KeywordBidAdjustment_Desc

data.name: Mobile_AddFunds_Payment_Succ_Opt
data.value: Use Opportunities to improve your campaign

data.name: Mobile_AddFunds_Tooltip
data.value:
What it is: This is the amount of money that you can effectively spend on advertising.

What you need to know: This section contains two figures: Account balance and Prepay total balance.

  • Account balance is the prepay amount you directly added to your account (minus taxes in locales where online advertising is taxable).
  • Prepay total balance is the combination of your account balance plus any credits and promotional balances.
  • Click costs, applicable taxes, and adjustments will be deducted from your available funds.

data.name: Mobile_WhatsNew_2_11_Body1
data.value: You can now monitor the performance and make changes to your Dynamic Search Ad Campaigns. Adjust budgets, pause or enable campaigns, and change bid settings of your ad groups all from within the app.

data.value: Add prepay funds on the go

data.name: Mobile_WhatsNew_2_12_Body1
data.value: Bing Ads App will alert you on the dashboard to take action when you've depleted your prepay balance. Click Add Funds on the alert to top up your balance quickly and conveniently.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Title
data.value: Do you want to show ads to people who are under 18 years of age?

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Desc1
data.value: As an advertiser, you are required to ensure that your ads comply with all applicable local and national regulations. You can opt out (and then back in, as necessary) of showing ads to signed-in users who are under 18 years of age by completing the following form.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Desc2
data.value: If your account is managed by an account team, please contact your account manager for assistance.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Option_Out
data.value: I do not want to show my ads to people under 18 years of age.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Option_In
data.value: I want to show my ads to people under 18 years of age.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Option_Note
data.value: Note: Ads that do not show to people under 18 years of age for policy reasons (for example, ads for gambling or adult products) will be unaffected by this setting.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_AccountChooser_Title
data.value: Select the accounts you want to apply this setting to:

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Result_Title_Out
data.value: Your selected accounts are now opted out of showing ads to people under 18 years of age.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Result_Title_In
data.value: Your selected accounts are now opted in to showing ads to people under 18 years of age.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Result_Desc1
data.value: Thank you. Well follow up with you if we need additional information.

data.name: OptOutForMinors_Result_Desc2
data.value: You can now navigate away or close this window.
